block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: I2C pins SCL : GPIO22 SDA : GPIO21
初始化 OLED 这是必要的 initialize the OLED this is necessary
屏幕将变黑 will blank the screen
在 (64,32) 处绘制一个像素 draw a pixel at (64,32)
从左上角到右下角画一条线 表示从 (0,0) 到 (127,63) 画一条线 draw a line from top left corner to bottom right corner means draw a line from (0,0) to (127,63)
在中心 (64,32) 绘制一个半径为 20 的实心圆 draw a filled circle at center (64,32) with radius of 20
在中心 (64,32) 绘制一个半径为 30 的圆 draw a circle at center (64,32) with radius of 30
画一个矩形，左上角位于 (16,8)，宽度=96，高度=48 draw a rectangle with top left at (16,8) and width=96 and height=48
绘制一个填充的矩形，左上角位于 (24,16)，宽度=80，高度=32 draw a filled rectangle with top left at (24,16) and width=80 and height=32

注意： 还有 1 个参数，即绘制线条的颜色 可用选项为 白色 / 黑色 / 反转 默认为白色 反转表示使用的颜色与背景颜色相反 Note : there is 1 more parameter which is color of the lines drawn Options available are White / Black / Invert Default is White Invert means color use will be inverse of background color
画一个三角形，其三个角分别为 (64,2)、(28,62) 和 (100,62) draw a triangle with 3 corner as (64,2), (28,62) and (100,62)
画一个实心三角形，3 个角分别为 (64,8)、(44,56) 和 (86,56) draw a filled triangle with 3 corner as (64,8), (44,56) and (86,56)
